description:
It’s time for Team Japan to face against Team France—Kayser! The Kayser brothers reveal their true form, and Gran Kayser has more special abilities than anyone could have imagined! And what’s worse, Kazuma might be disqualified for being late!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Étrange ! La vrai nature des Kayser !
พิสดารพันลึก!! ร่างจริงของไกเซอร์!
奇々怪々!! カイザーの正体!
